remarks: Moore closure preserves subset ordering.  Deduction form of ~ mrcss . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)
statement:
mrcssd.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. ( Moore ` X ) ) $.
mrcssd.2 $e |- N = ( mrCls ` A ) $.
mrcssd.3 $e |- ( ph -> U C_ V ) $.
mrcssd.4 $e |- ( ph -> V C_ X ) $.
mrcssd $p |- ( ph -> ( N ` U ) C_ ( N ` V ) ) $.
